detectors.description:
DefiBomb.switchSaleState() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiBomb.sol#825-827) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-saleIsOn = ! saleIsOn (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiBomb.sol#826)
function isContract(address account) internal view returns (bool) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiBomb.sol)#183

DefiBomb._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiBomb.sol#657-666) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiBomb.sol#663)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiBomb.sol#664)

detectors.description:

	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiBomb.sol#214)

Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiBomb.sol#276-297):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiBomb.sol#280)
